thread.title: Rob Kardashian & Blac Chyna Split AGAIN — Shocker!
thread.title_full: Rob Kardashian & Blac Chyna Split AGAIN — Shocker!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Rob Kardashian & Blac Chyna Split AGAIN — Shocker!
text:
Anyone surprised by this relationship update? 
It's being said Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna have split again… for the umpteenth time! 
Just earlier this month, it was rumored Dream Kardashian 's momma was cozying up to a new man amid a lack of social media posts of the couple together. 
Related: Chyna Allegedly Owes Managers 3 MILLION Dollars! 
Us Weekly reports the reality TV stars have decided to break up, with one source revealing: 
"Rob thinks it's the right decision. Chyna has disappeared for days at a time without communicating or providing any updates. This won't end well." 
In case you're keeping track , the last time these two were spotted together was on Snapchat right after ringing in the new year together! 
So what caused the twosome to part ways this time?? 
"[It's the same] with her yelling and screaming about how his family doesn't like or support her, and his insecurities." 
Rob and Chyna have a few things to work out if they want to get back together then. It always sounds like the same story, don't U think?? 
But who knows, maybe they'll be back on sometime soon!!
